      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.lang.String GameMaster.playerUsePotion(Hero player, Type type)
      this method uses a potion and creates an output string based on how much it restored the specified stat.

    • Uses of Type in enums.potions

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Uses of Type in models.monsters

      Methods in models.monsters with parameters of type Type 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Hero.potionsLeft(Type type)
      takes in a type to find a corresponding potion array and returns how many potions are left in that array.
      int Hero.usePotion(Type type)
      allows the hero to use a potion of the specified type and returns the amount restored.

    • Uses of Type in models.potions.base

      Fields in models.potions.base declared as Type 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Type Potion.type
      the Type of potion based on the Type enum.
      Constructors in models.potions.base with parameters of type Type 
      Constructor and Description
      Potion(int modifier, Type type)
      Constructor for Potion it takes in a modifier and multiplies it with a random number between 1 - 10 inclusive and sets the type of potion with the type past in.
